The protests intensified following Trump's announcement of tariffs on goods from countries opposing US control.

title: Did Mike Tomlin have an affair with a Pennsylvania nurse?
description: Mike Tomlin, the Pittsburgh Steelers’ former coach, sparked chaos when he stepped down from his role after 19 seasons. Many fans have remain confused about the exact reason behind Mike Tomlin’s move. Amid all the mess, there has been a new discussion about Mike Tomlin allegedly cheating on his wife, Kiya Tomlin, with a nurse from Pennsylvania.

title: Bill Belichick lands new ESPN role as North Carolina looks ahead after 4–8 season
description: Bill Belichick will appear on ESPN’s ACC Network broadcast of the College Football Playoff national championship game in South Florida. The TV role comes weeks after his first season as North Carolina’s head coach ended at 4–8. Belichick is also focused on recruiting, including adding quarterback Billy Edwards Jr. ahead of the Tar Heels’ April 12 spring game.

title: 'Inspired by Udaan’: UP RPF officer saved 1,500 kids; honoured with Railways’ highest award
description: Railway Protection Force Inspector Chandana Sinha has been honored for her exceptional work in rescuing over 1,500 children from UP's rail network. Her innovative system, built on trained officers and NGO partnerships, effectively spots and intercepts vulnerable children, including those trafficked for labor. Sinha's dedication has made her a model for child rescue initiatives.

Side hustle ends a Google career: Why this Bengaluru engineer was forced to quit
description: The resignation of Google engineer Arpit Bhayani over his educational side work has become a symbol of a deeper shift in India’s tech workforce. As freelancing surges and moonlighting checks tighten, companies and employees are drifting out of sync. The story reflects a growing tension between rigid corporate rules and a workforce that has quietly embraced flexible, parallel careers.

title: The silent curriculum: What Indian colleges overlook, but employers expect from graduates
description: Indian higher education's employability gap stems from a 'silent curriculum' largely missing for most students. Industry exposure, applied learning, certifications, and alumni networks, crucial for job readiness, remain theoretical for many. This invisible curriculum, not on transcripts, dictates outcomes, leaving degrees signaling education but not guaranteed professional readiness.

title: 'Negative': Why MrBeast 'cannot buy McDonald’s' despite $5 bn company valuation
Steelers nation demands change after Tomlin's steelers exit
description: Steelers Nation has accepted Mike Tomlin's departure after nearly two decades, with a poll showing 64.79% of fans believing it was the right decision. While acknowledging his past success and Super Bowl title, fans expressed frustration with recent playoff disappointments and conservative play-calling. Tomlin is reportedly considering a move to television.

title: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt's heartfelt life update amid team's tough season
description: The Kansas City Chiefs had a pretty disappointing season this time, but the billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has always been there for the team. Amid all the mess, Gracie Hunt has made a wholesome post about her life along with a few inspirational words that has moved fans. With the team's poor performance, many of their players are also getting trolled brutally.

title: Golden Hour: The daily time that can change your luck
description: Harness the power of the golden hour, the tranquil period just after sunrise and before sunset, for enhanced mental clarity and emotional openness. This naturally calming time, recognized in ancient Indian traditions, aligns your mind for manifestation.

title: Big AI switch: Meta’s gen AI chief joins Airbnb as CTO; OpenAI CEO Sam Altman reacts
description: Airbnb has appointed former Meta executive Ahmad Al-Dahle as its new CTO to bolster AI and personalization efforts. Al-Dahle, who led generative AI at Meta, will oversee Airbnb's engineering and data science teams. This move signals Airbnb's commitment to integrating advanced AI for enhanced travel experiences and personalized recommendations.
